dialogue.name: KELTRAENG
dialogue.text: I say, are you not from Eorzea? And by the looks of it, an adventurer besides?

dialogue.name: KELTRAENG
dialogue.text: Marvelous! You see, I have been dispatched here by the Adventurers' Guild to spread recognition of our establishment while helping us gain a foothold here in the Far East.

dialogue.name: KELTRAENG
dialogue.text: And what better way to the locals' hearts than by offering them our aidâ”€through guildleves, of course. We already have plenty of work for those with the skills, and I hope we can depend upon yours as well.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You now have access to guildleves in Kugane. Speak with Keltraeng to undertake tasks for Disciples of the Hand and Disciples of the Land.

dialogue.name: KELTRAENG
dialogue.text: I hope I can find skilled adventurers here, and enough of them to meet demand...

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: In order to undertake this quest, you must be a Disciple of the Hand or the Land of level 60 or above.
